ygData.subject: Journal website
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all. Found a website yesterday that lets players write journals for their characters.  I asked to have some stuff posted and sent in 2 stories.  They have
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all.
Found a website yesterday that lets players write
journals for their characters. I asked to have some
stuff posted and sent in 2 stories. They have aleady
been posted to my suprise. Granted, they aren't perfect
and I missed some erros in the flow, but go check out
the site and give me some feedback please. Also check
out the other entries there.
Below is the link to the main page. Click the News link
and you will see a link to my stories and the newest
entries by other authors.
Thanks for your support.

http://longroad.mpog.com/


--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
12th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
